overview: Muscular stud Matt Ramsey and his blond Cousin Billy Gant have the run of the house and pool when Matt's folks go on vacation, and these 'kissing cousins' do a helluva lot more than a kiss when Matt gets his hands on Billy's incredible surfer's ass!  Matt Ramsey made only a few all-male features. His rise to fame came by performing in Straight Adult Features under the name Peter North. This classic William Higgins pre-condom sizzler stars Matt as a straight shooter who experiences a sexual awakening, thanks to his Cousin and his buddies. A rare treat to see Matt Ramsey in an all-male feature!
title: Cousins
